product_name: The North Face Parkina Down Jacket - Women's
long_description: Modern quilting, a belted waist, and removable faux-fur hood trim gives The North Face Parkina jacket a sophisticated look. But don't be fooled: this is a super-warm, down-insulated weekend warrior. High-quality 600-fill-power goose down is warm, lightweight and compressible. Water-resistant down is treated to stay drier longer and dry faster than untreated down. Sturdy, polyester-twill exterior features a Durable Water Repellent finish. Stand-up collar keeps your neck warm even when hood is dropped; faux fur is detachable. Elastic belt has metal logo buckle and security belt tab. The North Face Parkina down jacket for women provides an interior media pocket with cord guide and zippered hand pockets. Internal stretch cuffs snug in warmth. Metal logo rivet at left bicep; embroidered logo at back right shoulder.
short_description: Modern quilting, a belted waist, and removable faux-fur hood trim gives The North Face Parkina jacket a sophisticated look. But don't be fooled: this is a super-warm, down-insulated weekend warrior.
